message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm initially offering it for $13,500.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between these prices?
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your position, but $13,500 is already a very competitive price for what this product can do for you. Could you consider meeting me halfway at $11,750?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable sticking to my original offer of $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To show my commitment to getting this deal done, I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is my final offer, as I believe it reflects the true value of the product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal, but I must respectfully decline. I am still firm on my original offer of $10,000. I believe this is a fair price given the value of the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
